episodes.title: Mackenzie is in jail for Shakahola, who is in jail for River Yala?: Karanja Kibicho #Events2025
episodes.description:
Mackenzie is in jail for Shakahola, who is in jail for River Yala?: Karanja Kibicho #Events2025 

Surely, if Kibicho murdered a person, why should he be walking free, he should be arrested and charged with murder. But since it is public mob justice, it looks like it's true. Tell me, why would the government not go for the people who killed people at River Yala? If Kibicho is guilty of that, go for him. Don't talk, just arrest him. Mackenzie is in jail for Shakahola, who is in jail for River Yala? - Karanja Kibicho, Former PS Interior.

#Events2025

episodes.title: Another Shakahola Cult? 11 Suspects found near Shakahola forest arraigned in Malindi Law Court
Faith Betrayed: The cult crisis uncovered
episodes.description:
As Kenya continues to mourn the Shakahola tragedy, another suspected cult has been uncovered this time in Rongo Town, Migori County. Two people died and 57 others, including children, were rescued from disturbing conditions in Melkio St. Joseph Missions of Messaiha Afrika Church .

In this urgent and revealing interview, Rev. Charles Moses Isaboke sheds light on the rise of cults in Kenya, how they manipulate faith, and what the Church, government, and citizens must do to fight back. The exploitation must end—and it starts with awareness, action, and protection for the most vulnerable.
subjects: Melkio St Joseph Missions of Messiah Africa Church

episodes.title: Pst.Owuor: Don’t Link Me With Shakahola
episodes.description:
Kings Outreach Church said to be associated with prophet David Owuor has dispelled some media reports that its deregistration was linked to the Shakahola happenings. 

The church’s leadership said that the closure of the church was not a result of any illegality but a subject of internal resolution by the leadership. He said that an annual general meeting held on December 3, 2022, had already resolved to dissolve the church and in its place focus on repentance holiness church in a bid to cut on financial costs.

In a gazette notice dated August 3, the registrar of societies deregistered five churches which include kings outreach. Other churches were pastor Ezekiel Odero Newlife Prayer Centre, Goodnews International Ministries, Helicopter of Christ church and Theophilus Church.

Thank you for watching this video. Kindly subscribe for more content from 'Home of The Untold Stories.'

episodes.title: Pastor Ezekiel Odero's church de-registered
episodes.description:
#DisruptiveFridays Pastor  Ezekiel Odero of the new life church has received a major blow after the registrar of societies deregistered his church and four other churches.

Ezekiel through his lawyer Dastan Omari has however appealed the decision.

 Controversial preacher Paul Mackenzie’s church ,good news  international   registration has also been revoked  in  an effort to tighten regulations  on religious organizations.
